channel.title: s3 on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in s3 on Barefoot Rob

item.title: missed the point
item.description: 16:33 Wednesday 13 January 2016 JST Now, I’m not 100% sure this is a bug, but I reported to AWS a few days ago: S3 bug: cannot create two lifecycle rules that apply to whole S3 bucket That’s just the title; I spelled it out a bit in the body of the message. But today I got back a steaming pile of useless reply: Hello Rob, This is ______ from the AWS Billing Department.
